attributes.action: Remove Greater Anglia, solve Network Rail issues, upgrade trains, lower fares
attributes.additional_details: Greater Anglia charge a huge amount more than C2C with a much lesser service. There are constant delays, cancellations, old worn trains without similar facilities to C2C. Greater Anglia make it very difficult to claim any fares back from such poor service. They also fail to support commuters (tax payers!)
attributes.background: Remove Greater Anglia from all rail franchises UK wide, solve constant delay issues relating to Network Rail maintained track and signalling systems, suitably upgrade trains and reduce fares so that they are in line with similar journeys across Essex

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
